testCase.name: MCard Card Listing and Pagination should list cards with default pagination
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should support custom pagination
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should validate list parameters
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should handle out-of-range page numbers
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should correctly calculate total pages and cards
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should support various page sizes
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should maintain card order across pages
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should handle maximum page size limit
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should provide accurate pagination metadata
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should handle dynamic card count and pagination
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should handle edge cases in pagination
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should handle network or server errors gracefully
MCard Card Listing and Pagination should support debug logging
MCard Large Scale and Binary Content Handling should handle large number of binary content cards
MCard Large Scale and Binary Content Handling should handle mixed content types with large files
MCard Server Connection should connect to server health endpoint
MCard Server Connection should create a simple card
MCard Server Connection should retrieve a created card
MCard Server Connection should delete a card
MCard Advanced Error Handling Tests Content Validation Errors should throw ValidationError for extremely long content
MCard Advanced Error Handling Tests Content Type Validation should detect binary content
MCard Advanced Error Handling Tests Content Type Validation should handle different content types
MCard Advanced Error Handling Tests Content Type Validation should handle unicode and special characters
MCard Advanced Error Handling Tests Network-Related Error Handling should handle network-related issues
MCard Advanced Error Handling Tests Network-Related Error Handling should throw AuthorizationError for missing API key
